review_details:
Had a wonderful day out at sea.
3km of nets where wheeled in with plenty of fish, kalamari and other sea creatures.
Kids loved it also very much (boys aged 6 and 8) and where hands-on fish and nets all day plus plenty of swimming and snorkling:)

Also food made from the catch was superb!
Fun day full of experiences for all ages :)
Want to just go again.
Highly recommend!

Probably the best experience!
Lovely place to eat, nice views, food that is superb and done with passion.

Super place to vist with family.
Kid`s loved the deep pool, playground and the grounds in general.
For parents also the pool is superb. Nice, deep and clean.

A car is recommended but walk to the main village and beach was also doable (about 10 min).

Went with family in june 2015 and loved it!

Very deep and clean pool, kids (and I) loved it, also best restaurants were in the walking distance, also a a minimarket. Walk to the beach was about 7-8 minutes, nice walk.
Clean, spacious and good wifi, overall good place to be.
Only thing I'd like to add is a full size fridge

Super friendly and helpful hosts, nice deep pool, fast wifi.
About 7-8 min stroll to the beach, best tavernas and a minimarket 200-300 metres away.
Loved it and will be going back if in Chania for sure.
Only thing I'd like to add is a full-size fridge.

OK for kid`s but quite expensive, about 80 euros entrance for 2 adults and 2 children.
Staff is helpful :)

A tourist trap with not too much out of the ordinary, great selection of cheeses on the positive part.
Hard to find a parking space,

Look`s beautiful but very-very windy, loved the mountain roads You have to drive to get there.
In a good (not windy) day perfect for kids to play in shallow water.

Amazingly beautiful but very hard to get to.
You have to basically mountain-climb for 20 min down and up. But worth the climb!
